parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.34

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Ropes and Sling Loading

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Increases or decreases the rope length by the given amount. Use relative parameter for changing rope length +/- from current length.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[ropeUnwind]] [rope, speed, length, relative]

</value></part><part><name>p1 </name>=<value> rope: [[Object]] - rope object

</value></part><part><name>p2 </name>=<value> speed: [[Number]] - animation speed in m/s with which to lengthen or shorten the rope. Range: 0.01...20.

</value></part><part><name>p3 </name>=<value> length: [[Number]] - the amount of length change in meters. Range: 0.1...100.

</value></part><part><name>p4 </name>=<value> relative (Optional): [[Boolean]] - [[true]] will add or subtract given length from current rope length, [[false]] will resize the rope to the given length

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[ropeUnwind]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[ropes]] heli1 [[select]] 0, 3, 10]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>set rope length to 10m at 3m/s</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[ropeUnwind]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[ropes]] heli1 [[select]] 0, 3, -5, true]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>decrease rope length by 5m at 3m/s</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ropes]], [[canSlingLoad]], [[enableRopeAttach]], [[getSlingLoad]], [[ropeAttachedObjects]], [[ropeAttachTo]], [[ropeDestroy]], [[ropeLength]], [[ropeUnwound]], [[ropeAttachedTo]], [[ropeCreate]], [[ropeDetach]], [[ropeAttachEnabled]], [[ropeCut]], [[ropeEndPosition]], [[setSlingLoad]], [[slingLoadAssistantShown]]
</value></part></template>


<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on November 8, 2014 - 15:28 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Tajin|Tajin]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
Unwinding speed is not linear but instead automatically accelerates at the beginning and slows down at the end.<br>
The speed also only seems to have no effect when pulling the rope in. (unless the end of the rope is not attached to anything)<br>
High unwinding speeds (over ~250) can cause your cargo to get stuck in midair.
</dd>

<dd class="notedate">Posted on January 4, 2015 - 02:43 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Feint|Feint]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
Rope length limits are between 0.5 and 100 meters.
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
